summary: A launcher for Skyrim with improvements.
descriptionHtml:
[b]About[/b]
A launcher for Skyrim with improvements including a character manager and load order editor.

Note: This is an alpha version of ISL. It does work and I haven\'t had any problems, but you should back up the following files just in case:
[ul]
[*]C:\\Users\\<username>\\AppData\\Local\\Skyrim\\plugins.txt
[*]C:\\Users\\<username>\\AppData\\Local\\Skyrim\\loadorder.txt (if using BOSS, NMM or similar programs)
[*]C:\\Users\\<username>\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves
[*]C:\\Users\\<username>\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Skyrim.ini
[*]C:\\Users\\<username>\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\SkyrimPrefs.ini
[/ul]

[b]Prerequisites[/b]
As far as I know, only one:
[ul]
[*][url=http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17113].Net Framework 4.0 Client Profile[/url].
[/ul]
I\'ve only tested this on my own computer, so there could be extra dependencies that I don\'t know about.

[b]How to install[/b]
[ol]
[*]Copy \"ImprovedSkyrimLauncher.exe\" and \"ImprovedSkyrimLauncher.ini\" to the directory where Skyrim is installed.
[*]Find the start menu shortcut to Skyrim, right-click it and click \"Properties\".
[*]Under the \"Shortcut\" tab, change \"Target\" to point to \"ImprovedSkyrimLauncher.exe\".
[*]Press OK.
[/ol]

[b]Current features[/b]
[ul]
[*]Select, backup, create and delete characters
[*]View & modify plugin load order
[*]Load Skyrim (obviously), optionally using SKSE (if installed)
[/ul]

[b]Planned features[/b]
+ Change graphics settings (as in vanilla launcher)
+ Use BOSS API to automatically set load order (or, failing that, just run BOSS if installed)
+ Back up saves during gameplay
+ NMM script install

[b]Known bugs[/b]
[ul]
[*]Pressing the \"Backup character\" button with a character selected results in an error message.
[/ul]
author: Chris
